name: Spooky Death House
description:
IT'S TIME TO SPOOK! Humans are coming to your new haunted house and it is your job to scare their pants off!

Click on rooms and select which monster/trap to place down in order to scare the incoming waves of humans!

Check out the other games from OUGDA on our website and support Ohio University game development!

http://ohiougda.weebly.com
